alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 12:13PM CDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following river in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi. .Widespread heavy rainfall is expected tonight into Friday night across the area. Rainfall totals of 3 to 4 inches with localized higher amounts are expected to cause significant rises on the Little Wabash River. Based on these amounts, at Carmi, the river is expected to eventually crest around 7 feet above flood stage. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday afternoon, and continue rising to a crest of 34.0 feet Wednesday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
